title-english: Our Role in the Fight Against Rise in Prices
creator: Shafik, Doria
description-english: This article is about women’s role in the fight against commodity price rise. Women are capable of serving themselves, their families and their community in many different ways. This would include a more economical consumption behavior as to winter clothing and domestic expenditures.
description-arabic: تتحدث هذه المقالة عن دور المرأة في محاربة الغلاء، حيث أن المرأة في استطاعتها أن تفعل الكثير لنفسها ولبيتها ولمحيطها، كأن تراعي مثلاً الاعتدال في ملبسها والاقتصاد في نفقات المنزل بشكل عام.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Our Role in the Fight Against Rise in Prices
